snippet.title: Virush | Survival + Tower Defense + Puzzle Hybrid | Turn Based Arcade | PICO-8 Indie Spotlight
snippet.description:
Virush
• https://afk-mario.itch.io/virush

Virush is an awesome little arcade survival game that blends elements of tower defense, survival, , and puzzle genres for a turn-based roguelite-ish experience, that offers up hand-crafted levels, but unpredictable enemy behaviors.  This game is absolutely fantastic and is yet another on the PICO-8 that we'll surely be coming back to!  How many nights can you survive?!?

Thanks for watching!  If you'd like to find us elsewhere on the internet, head on over to:

• https://linktr.ee/pursuingpixels
